name: FetchFileVersionHistory
description:
Fetch the version history of a Figma file.

Use this tool to obtain the version history of a specific Figma file, enabling the analysis of its changes over time. This can be useful for reviewing past edits or rendering specific versions.

parameters.name: target_file_key
parameters.description: The key of the file or branch to fetch version history for. Use this to specify the Figma file whose version history you need.

value_schema.description: File to get version history from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

parameters.name: number_of_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of items to return per page. Defaults to 30 if not provided.

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in a page of the response. If not included, `page_size` is `30`.

parameters.name: get_versions_before_id
parameters.description: A version ID to get versions before it in the history. Used for pagination.

value_schema.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions before this ID. Used for paginating. If the response is not paginated, this link returns the same data in the current response.

parameters.name: after_version_id
parameters.description: Version ID to fetch subsequent versions. Used for pagination. Omit if not paginating.

value_schema.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions after this ID. Used for paginating. If the response is not paginated, this property is not included.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items returned in a page of the response. If not included, `page_size` is `30`.

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in a page of the response. If not included, `page_size` is `30`.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions before this ID. Used for paginating. If the response is not paginated, this link returns the same data in the current response.

value_schema.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions before this ID. Used for paginating. If the response is not paginated, this link returns the same data in the current response.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions after this ID. Used for paginating. If the response is not paginated, this property is not included.

value_schema.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions after this ID. Used for paginating. If the response is not paginated, this property is not included.

parameters.name: file_key
parameters.description: File to get version history from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

value_schema.description: File to get version history from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
